Actions.Name: Build Barricade
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a line 4 terrain effect in free space, with at least one space adjacent. The effect is difficult terrain, the [name] deals bonus damage to characters in the area, and foes that enter or exit the area are weakened.

Actions.Name: Great Golden Knuckles
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 2 for every valuables token the [name] is holding.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes 4 damage, then 4 damage again, once for every valuables token the [name] is holding.
